about_the_game:
More Weapons to come with Sword Art Online: Fatal Bullet Season Pass Bonuses!
It includes the following amazing weapons:
-Photon Sword Pink
-Photon Sword Green
-Guitar Launcher

name: forclaz - DLC 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570K 3.40 GHz / AMD FX-4100 Quad-Core Processor 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 660 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 3.6GHz / AMD FX-9370 8-Core 4.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 960 4GB / AMD R9 290 HD 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard
